title: Champion not appearing
body: Just bought Fiora and she's not showing up in my collection. She also wasn't in my pick list in the last champ select I was in. I've already restarted my client, if anyone else has had this issue and fixed it pls let me know :D

replies.body:
I'm having this issue too. I've spent RP twice on Veigar and he's not in my collection, and same for Amumu. Can I get a refund?

Edit: I have Veigar now, after reloading the client, but I was still charged 2x for it
Hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can reverse that double payment if you were in fact charged twice!
Happened right before I made the post

We had a little hiccup with the store earlier today where some of these purchases were slowed down. Basically, the purchase went through but took an abnormally long time to get that content added. It looks like you've got Fiora now, but let me know if you still don't see her after refreshing the client again!

Yeah I got it a little while after I made the post :D Thank you! Also, I just used my orianna champion shard for a 7 day trial instead of full :( can you help me out? I really want Ori so I have a safe mid laner to play.
If that JUST happened, hit up our billing agents in a ticket asap. They'll be able to get that straightened out for ya as long as this mistake happened recently!
